message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique and valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you is $12000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me is $12000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me is $15000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $12000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $15500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me is $15000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $12000.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13000. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $14500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me is $15000.

I appreciate your willingness to make adjustments, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12800 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me is $12000.

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12800. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me is $15000.
I appreciate your efforts to find a compromise, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $12000. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. This is my final offer.
